messages.subject: Newbie Intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I found this group from another site I thought I would introduce myself. My name is Christina, I am a single mother of two daughters ages 10 & 11.
messages.messageBody:
Hello, I found this group from another site I thought I would introduce
myself. My name is Christina, I am a single mother of two daughters
ages 10 & 11. Currently they both are attending public school, however
we are moving out of the area and Im pretty sure Ive decided to home
school them both. So I have been researching, and trying to gather
different ways to best teach my children from home. Anyways, I'm sure
as I search through the current posting I may find some great
information or suggestions. However if you have any links, or advice I
would be very grateful.

Thank you,

Christina
